title: Digital Competency Enhancement Education Program Utilizing Augmented Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customized education for professionals emphasizing problem-solving skills using augmented reality technology in real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform data visualization and analysis in a task simulation environment using augmented reality tools.
Learners can demonstrate digital communication competencies by interacting with team members on a VR-based collaboration platform.
Learners can analyze factors driving societal change in the digital age through case studies applying AR technology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
